user_question: How can I train my cat to use a litter box in a spaceship?
final_answer: To train your cat to use a litter box in a spaceship, ensure the litter box is securely fastened to prevent movement, use familiar litter, and gradually acclimate your cat to the new environment by rewarding it with treats when it uses the box.
